attributes.action: Create a month of National Celebrations to Celebrate Polish History.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Black History is being celebrated at an enormous cost to the UK taxpayer.

In the interests of Fairness and balance, Polish History should be celebrated also.

If a parent of two children bought bags of sweets but only ever offered them to the same one then the child left out would grow up to resent their parent as well as their brother or sister.

Get the Picture Mr Brown!
